#include<iostream>
using namespace std;

int binary(int index[],int a[],int n,int j)
{
	int low=0;
	int high=n-1;
	int mid;
	while(low<=high)
	{
		mid=(low+high)/2;
		if (a[index[mid]] <= j)
		{
			low=mid+1;
		}
		else
		{
			high=mid-1;
		}
	}
	return low;
}
int main()
{
	int n,i,index[100001],a[100001],l,ind,parent[100001];
	cin>>n;
	for (i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		cin>>a[i];
		index[i]=i;
	}
//	cout<<binary(index,a,n,1000);
	l=0;
	for (i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		ind=binary(index,a,l,a[i]);
		if (ind<l)
		{
			if (a[i] == a[index[ind]])
			{
				ind++;
			}
		}
		index[ind]=i;
		if (ind!=0)
		parent[i]=index[ind-1];
		if (ind==l)
		{
			l++;
		}
	}
	cout<<l<<endl;
	return 0;
}
